about_the_game:
Experience the early preview of Motorbike Evolution, a multiplayer racing game that blends classic racing excitement with MMO elements. This demo offers a first taste of the game’s core mechanics and multiplayer features, so you can dive right into the action!


In this demo, race with up to 24 players and challenge yourself to master motorbikes spanning from the early 1900s to more modern machines. Gain experience points and credits to unlock vehicles and basic upgrades, giving you a chance to see how progression will work in the full game. Can you rise to the top with the limited resources available?


The demo is designed to be accessible, with simplified controls that let you enjoy the thrill of racing without a steep learning curve. Expect fast-paced races, reminiscent of old-school arcade racers. While it's not a hardcore simulator, realistic physics still play a role, so careful riding is rewarded!


- First motorbikes out of 80 from 120 years of history
- First 30 out of 50 real and custom tracks
- 1000+ various vehicle setups
- 30+ vehicle patterns, each customizable
- 10 different biomes


Get a glimpse of the customization system: change colors and apply a variety of patterns to your motorbikes, allowing for a small but meaningful way to make each vehicle your own.


Even in this demo, cloud save technology is enabled, along with basic leaderboards to compare your racing performance. Track your progress, aim for high scores, and enjoy a taste of the competitive edge to come!
detailed_description:
Experience the early preview of Motorbike Evolution, a multiplayer racing game that blends classic racing excitement with MMO elements. This demo offers a first taste of the game’s core mechanics and multiplayer features, so you can dive right into the action!


In this demo, race with up to 24 players and challenge yourself to master motorbikes spanning from the early 1900s to more modern machines. Gain experience points and credits to unlock vehicles and basic upgrades, giving you a chance to see how progression will work in the full game. Can you rise to the top with the limited resources available?


The demo is designed to be accessible, with simplified controls that let you enjoy the thrill of racing without a steep learning curve. Expect fast-paced races, reminiscent of old-school arcade racers. While it's not a hardcore simulator, realistic physics still play a role, so careful riding is rewarded!


- First motorbikes out of 80 from 120 years of history
- First 30 out of 50 real and custom tracks
- 1000+ various vehicle setups
- 30+ vehicle patterns, each customizable
- 10 different biomes


Get a glimpse of the customization system: change colors and apply a variety of patterns to your motorbikes, allowing for a small but meaningful way to make each vehicle your own.


Even in this demo, cloud save technology is enabled, along with basic leaderboards to compare your racing performance. Track your progress, aim for high scores, and enjoy a taste of the competitive edge to come!
ext_user_account_notice: Engine Evolution cloud (Supports Linking to Steam Account)
name: Motorbike Evolution 2025 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 bit
  • Processor: 2,2+ GH Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660+
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD disk is recommended, GPU compute shader capability required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 bit
  • Processor: 3,0+ GH Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960+
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD disk is recommended, GPU compute shader capability required

short_description: Get a first taste of Motorbike Evolution! Race through history on iconic bikes, with up to 24 players, customizable setups, and thrilling multiplayer action!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Swedish, Ukrainian, Spanish - Latin America, Bulgarian
